attributes.action: Limit the brightness of car headlights.
attributes.additional_details: As I’m getting older I find it harder to see whilst driving at night with the brightness of newer car headlights.
attributes.background: Newer headlights can affect older drivers because of the brightness. Bring in a maximum brightness level.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Ban LED headlights
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/701233
